sentences.sContent: A red sandstone mosque stands on one side.
sentences.sContent_eng: A red sandstone mosque stands on one side.
sentences.sCn: 一座红色砂岩清真寺耸立在一旁。

sentences.sContent: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.sContent_eng: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.sCn: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.sContent: Before we got the tents, some children were studying in the mosque.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before we got the tents, some children were studying in the mosque.
sentences.sCn: 在我们有这些帐篷之前，一些孩子在清真寺学习。

trans.tranOther: a building in which Muslims worship
